entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon.
